summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 9158, entitled "An Ordinance creating the office of Inspector of Steam Boilers, prescribing the duties of such officer, the duties of the owners of steam boilers, fixing the fees for inspection, fixing the salary and compensation of such officer, and providing a penalty for any violation of said Ordinance," approved January 20, 1903 and Ordinance No. 12089, approved February 20, 1905 amendatory thereof.
